Name: aortic valve disease 1
Definition: A bicuspid aortic valve disease that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutation in the NOTCH1 gene on chromosome 9q34.

Name: aortic valve disease 2
Definition: A bicuspid aortic valve disease that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutation in the SMAD6 gene on chromosome 15q22.
